name: Looped - The Horror Game
description:
Are you brave enough to face a terrifying and haunting experience, if so this is the right game for you!

"Looped - The horror game" is a game full of scares that will hit you when you are least expecting it and have your hands shaking, experience the spine chilling atmosphere as you walk through the game and collect items to help you progress through the story!

Explore the old and haunted mansion and try to find the way out if you can, Looped is the scariest mobile horror game you’ll ever play !
